price: (10) Indeed, We fear from our Lord a Day austere and distressful."
arabic: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوۡمًا عَبُوسٗا قَمۡطَرِيرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: innā nakhāfu min rabbinā yawman ʿabūsan qamṭarīran
